## kismatic ssh

ssh into a node in the cluster

### Synopsis


ssh into a node in the cluster

```
kismatic ssh HOST [commands]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --plan-file string   path to the installation plan file (default "kismatic-cluster.yaml")
```
